component.name: OpenFOAM
component.summary: Free and open-source CFD software for computational fluid dynamics

description.p: OpenFOAM (Open Source Field Operation and Manipulation) is a free, open-source CFD (computational fluid dynamics) software package developed primarily for numerical simulation of fluid flow, heat transfer, and associated physical processes.
This Flatpak includes the OpenFOAM release along with its ThirdParty libraries and MPI support. After launching, it opens an interactive shell with the OpenFOAM environment initialized.
